content.rendered:
Ontario permit application



can help you apply for Ontario permits

When you need assistance with an Ontario permit application, is here for you. We firmly believe that group contribution results in the best possible projects. That's why we carefully work side-by-side with every client from start to finish

This ensures there are no nasty surprises. Not only that but all Ontario permit applications take place seamlessly, on time, and in line with client expectations. See what development application services we specialize in below:

VIEW OUR PORTFOLIO

  • 1. Site plan approval

    Receiving site plan approval means that your property development is built and maintained to specific standards of quality and appearance. For example, your property has adequate parking, that it is protected from nearby noise, and that there is safe and easy access for visitors. These are just three typical components.

    Having already fostered positive relations with municipal planning staff throughout Southern Ontario, we’ll strive to get you a site plan agreement as quickly as possible, answering all your questions along the way.

  • 2. Zoning certificates

    Receiving a Zoning Certificate of Occupancy means that any change or new use of your property has been agreed in line with an Ontario town or city’s zoning bylaw. We’ve seen firsthand how vacant units have been transformed into care homes, restaurants, retail stores, and other facilities.

    When you need to determine compliance with every zoning regulation in a town or city’s Zoning By-law, choose . We understand how zoning bylaws work and can realistically set your expectations when embarking on any change or new use for your property.

  • 3. Building permits

    Receiving an approved building permit means that any construction change, renovation, or demolishment relating to your property has been given the green light in line with Ontario’s Building Code.

    Ontario building permits are required for 99% of domestic renovation assignments, and the team understands them inside out. When you need construction sketches reviewed by municipal planning staff, can provide the professional assistance you need.

  • 4. Committee of Adjustment

    Here in , the Committee of Adjustment holds public hearings about variances to city zoning bylaws and land severances. When you want to make a written submission to the committee or want to participate in virtual public hearings, speak to first. We can successfully prepare you for such hearings so that you ask the right questions and get the answers you need.

  • 5. Conservation

    Elsewhere, can assist you with applying for conservation authority permits too. They ensure long-term protection and management of nearby natural systems. By contacting first, we’ll ensure that you are meeting every legal and legislative policy requirement requested.

  • 6. Regional approvals

    For all other regional approvals that you require professional assistance with, get in contact with today.

Don’t wait! Discuss your dream build now.

WHAT CLIENTS SAY

Gurjit S.

What Clients Say

“Working with was amazing. is a great person to work with and he helped me design my dream house. He always listens and provides great feedback. I would highly recommend working with this business!”

Gurjit S.
Google my Business

“We chose based on a referral from a friend and builder. Our experience dealing directly with has been very rewarding as we enjoy the patience and professionalism that their team provides. We shared our big picture dream, and the team has made it a reality and now it is time to submit to the city for permits. Very exciting.”

GS
Google my Business

“Totally impressed!! I have had a pleasure working with from As a professional Architect, he listens carefully and understands your taste and needs and while his fee is fair, he's totally professional and responsive. He'll sure get the design of your dream home done, above and beyond your expectations. I cannot say enough good things about , but all in all, it was a pleasure working with him and I look forward to working with him in the future.”

R Daneshvar
Google my Business

“I have known for several years and have hired his services for 2 residential and one commercial jobs. He is very professional, has great ideas and is responsive to adjustments and innovative concepts. has always been fair with pricing and pays attention to the fine details required. His company is 5 stars in my books!”

Paul M.
Google my Business

“ patiently worked with us to explore the different possibilities on a variety of projects that included commercial properties and residential subdivisions. They carefully took the time to explain the process in its entirety and demonstrated a continued dedication towards maintaining a transparent and collaborative client-architect relationship. We are appreciative of the help, and we have a great deal of respect both for the work the firm does as well as for and the rest of the team.”

Ghazawan
Google my Business

“ is a brilliant architect who has a real eye for design! I have worked with him personally and found him and his firm to be most accommodating and wanting to go that extra mile. His insight is invaluable to anyone wanting to design their dream home.”

Dan C
Google my Business

“We have been working with for almost two years, they have designed a Banquet Hall for us, they are very professional and responsive to every question we have. We are almost getting our permit and we had a lot of help from them to achieve our goal. I would highly recommend them.”

Nada M
Google my Business

“ and his team designed a new home for our family in Mississauga/Mineola West area. managed the whole process (Site Plan Approval, Committee of Adjustments, Building Permits) and delivered every step of the way. We were satisfied with his services, and he did great work overall.”

Massimo N
Google my Business
